channel.title: Remove command will not work
channel.description:
Ok so I have this issue with my "Remove" command. The command is ;;remove and what it does is once you examine an object, and then execute the code ;;remove, it will remove that object from the game. This is a Rune-Evo base. Well it does delete the object from the game, visually it will disappear. The issue is everytime i shut off the server to reboot it for an update, the objects i used on the remove command, come back. Does anyone have an idea as to why this is happening?
~Lonely (Ignore the name Jesus, idk why my name is that)

item.title: Remove command will not work
item.dc:creator: @_JESUS2 LonelySouls
item.description:
@_JESUS2 wrote:

Ok so I have this issue with my “Remove” command. The command is ;;remove and what it does is once you examine an object, and then execute the code ;;remove, it will remove that object from the game. This is a Rune-Evo base. Well it does delete the object from the game, visually it will disappear. The issue is everytime i shut off the server to reboot it for an update, the objects i used on the remove command, come back. Does anyone have an idea as to why this is happening?

~Lonely
